about_intro: Family Spots Map was created from real family needs – by parents for parents.
about_body_1: The map highlights handpicked playgrounds, zoos, wildlife parks, pump tracks, child-friendly museums and more.
about_body_2: The focus is on quality, safety and real experiences. Save your favorites and plan your next adventures – even offline.
about_body_3: The app grows with the community. Every new spot is an invitation: go out, explore, and build memories.
